bags.name: Leather Tote Handbag
bags.description: A stylish and versatile tote handbag made from premium genuine leather. Designed for modern women, this bag offers a spacious interior, multiple compartments, and a durable zipper closure. Perfect for everyday use, office, or special occasions.

bags.name: Anti-Theft Laptop Backpack
bags.description: The Samsonite Anti-Theft Laptop Backpack is perfect for professionals and students. With a hidden zipper design, USB charging port, and a padded laptop sleeve, it ensures security, convenience, and comfort. Crafted from waterproof nylon, it protects your belongings from rain and spills.

bags.name: Vintage Canvas Messenger Bag
bags.description: A rugged yet stylish canvas messenger bag featuring a blend of classic and modern design. Equipped with multiple compartments, an adjustable shoulder strap, and secure magnetic closure, this bag is perfect for work, school, or casual outings.

bags.name: Expandable Wheeled Travel Bag
bags.description: Designed for frequent travelers, this durable and lightweight wheeled travel bag features 360° spinner wheels, an expandable compartment, and a TSA-approved lock for security. A perfect companion for business trips and vacations.

bags.name: Sports Duffel Gym Bag
bags.description: The ultimate gym bag for athletes and fitness enthusiasts. Features a ventilated shoe compartment, spacious main storage, and water-resistant fabric to keep your gear dry. The adjustable shoulder strap provides comfort for carrying on the go.

bags.name: Designer Evening Clutch
bags.description: An elegant designer evening clutch that adds a touch of glamour to any outfit. Made with a luxurious velvet finish, a delicate chain strap, and an intricate metal clasp, this clutch is perfect for formal events, weddings, and parties.

bags.name: Kids Cartoon Backpack
bags.description: A fun and colorful backpack featuring beloved Disney characters, designed especially for kids. With padded straps for comfort, a side pocket for water bottles, and durable zippers, it's perfect for school and travel.
